responses: The Welcome Speech is on 16 January 2025, from 07:00 PM to 08:30 PM.

patterns: Where is the welcome speech held?
responses: The Welcome Speech will be held at Block C, James Cook University Singapore.

patterns: Who will give the welcome speech?
responses:
The Welcome Speech will be given by the Deputy Vice-Chancellor, Singapore, 
and the Acting Campus Dean & Head of Learning, Teaching & Student Engagement.

patterns: When will welcome speech is happening?
responses:
Welcome Speech Schedule:
07:00 PM – 07:10 PM: Welcome Speech by Deputy Vice-Chancellor, Singapore
07:10 PM – 07:20 PM: Welcome Speech by Acting Campus Dean & Head of Learning, Teaching & Student Engagement
07:20 PM – 07:25 PM: JCU 101
Proceed to Breakout Rooms
The Academic Briefing is on 16 January 2025, from 07:25 PM to 08:30 PM.

Academic Advising will be conducted by:
Associate Professor, Counselling
Academic Head, Social and Health Sciences
Academic Head, Business

patterns: Which courses are applicable for the Welcome Speech?
responses:
Applicable Courses:
Part-Time Diploma of Higher Education (Psychological Science)
Part-Time Bachelor of Psychological Science
Part-Time Master of Guidance and Counselling
Part-Time Business Programs
